Subjects: Anastasia, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Anastasia in the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
[Þe] nobil womane anastacein rome of þat kine borne
                    wes…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…þat scho mak ws hyne to twynebut ded schame or dedly
                    syne

Metcalfe,  William Musham,
